attributes.action: Reopen the parks in Hammersmith and Fulham
attributes.additional_details: The Prime Minister himself has stated that parks should remain open so that people can exercise once a day. There is no reason for the parks of Hammersmith and Fulham to remain closed now that stronger policing is in place to stop people gathering in groups of more than two. The council are denying citizens the basic right to green space and daily exercise.
attributes.background: Hammersmith and Fulham council have closed all the parks in the borough. Please reopen them for the health and sanity of the people of Hammersmith and Fulham.

rejection.details:
Since you started your petition, the council has opened parks. 

In any case, this is not the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament
